SELECT bno, title, genre, releaseDate, raiting, director FROM (SELECT m.bno bno, m.title title, g.genre genre, m.releaseDate releaseDate, m.raiting raiting, m.director director, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS rNUM FROM movie_table m, genre_table g WHERE m.genre_code = g.genre_code
) brd WHERE rNUM BETWEEN (#{perPageNum} * #{pageNum} - 9) and (#{perPageNum} * #{pageNum}) ORDER BY bno DESC;
